body.p: ATTEND THE CLASS PICNIC Four classes of the Black River Falls High school pledged themselves to leave as a lasting memorial the beautiful curtain and other stage fixtures that have been of so much use 1 for the many events that have been held in the high school auditorium since it was completed. Two of the classes have made their payment and gone on their way. The class this year will make another and then the class of 1940 will complete the gift. The one big event of the year from , which a class hopes to realize an ap- preciable amount as their gift is their class play. The members of the cast go to a great deal of work to make it a successful event. Spring Fever is the play this year. It will be giv- en Friday evening, March 24th. Tick- ets are now being sold. It is an un- usually good play and promises a nice evening?s entertainment. You may do your bit toward encouraging the class and toward making your con- tribution to their gift by attending the play. Plan to reserve Friday night of next week for that purpose.
